title: Handle an Offer Rejection
description: A buyer's offer was rejected by the seller. The agent needs to inform the buyer and discuss next steps.

tasks.description: Receive the rejection notice from the listing agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies that the offer was rejected without a counter.

tasks.description: Inform the buyer client of the rejection in a clear and empathetic manner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the bad news professionally.

tasks.description: Advise the buyer on potential strategies, such as submitting a higher offer or looking for other properties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides constructive advice and strategic options to the client.
